languages.text: "Ваши доказательства, доводы, свидетели и даже Лекс Империалис — всего лишь жалкая попытка совладать с кем-то вроде меня. В Просторе есть только один закон и это — я! И я приговариваю всех вас к смерти за неповиновение!"

"Your evidence, arguments, witnesses, and even the Lex Imperialis are just a pathetic attempt to gain the upper hand over someone like me. There is only one law in the Expanse and I am it! And I sentence you all to death for insubordination!"
languages.original_text: "Ваши доказательства, доводы, свидетели и даже Лекс Империалис — всего лишь жалкая попытка совладать с кем-то вроде меня. В Просторе есть только один закон и это — я! И я приговариваю всех вас к смерти за неповиновение!"

traits.locale_text: "Your evidence, arguments, witnesses, and even the Lex Imperialis are just a pathetic attempt to gain the upper hand over someone like me. There is only one law in the Expanse and I am it! And I sentence you all to death for insubordination!"

"Your evidence, arguments, witnesses, and even the Lex Imperialis are just a pathetic attempt to gain the upper hand over someone like me. There is only one law in the Expanse and I am it! And I sentence you all to death for insubordination!"

"Your evidence, arguments, witnesses, and even the Lex Imperialis are just a pathetic attempt to gain the upper hand over someone like me. There is only one law in the Expanse and I am it! And I sentence you all to death for insubordination!"

"Your evidence, arguments, witnesses, and even the Lex Imperialis are just a pathetic attempt to gain the upper hand over someone like me. There is only one law in the Expanse and I am it! And I sentence you all to death for insubordination!"

"Your evidence, arguments, witnesses, and even the Lex Imperialis are just a pathetic attempt to gain the upper hand over someone like me. There is only one law in the Expanse and I am it! And I sentence you all to death for insubordination!"

languages.text: "Eure Beweise, Argumente, Zeugen und selbst das Lex Imperia sind nur jämmerliche Versuche, über jemanden wie mich die Oberhand zu gewinnen. Es gibt in der Ausdehnung nur ein Gesetz, und das bin ich! Deshalb verurteile ich Euch alle wegen Insubordination zum Tode!"
languages.original_text: "Your evidence, arguments, witnesses, and even the Lex Imperialis are just a pathetic attempt to gain the upper hand over someone like me. There is only one law in the Expanse and I am it! And I sentence you all to death for insubordination!"

traits.locale_text: "Eure Beweise, Argumente, Zeugen und selbst das Lex Imperia sind nur jämmerliche Versuche, über jemanden wie mich die Oberhand zu gewinnen. Es gibt in der Ausdehnung nur ein Gesetz, und das bin ich! Deshalb verurteile ich Euch alle wegen Insubordination zum Tode!"

languages.text: « Vos preuves, vos arguments, vos témoins et même la Lex Imperialis ne sont que de déplorables tentatives de prendre l'ascendant sur moi. Les Étendues ne connaissent qu'une seule loi : la mienne ! Et je vous condamne tous à mort pour insubordination ! »
languages.original_text: "Your evidence, arguments, witnesses, and even the Lex Imperialis are just a pathetic attempt to gain the upper hand over someone like me. There is only one law in the Expanse and I am it! And I sentence you all to death for insubordination!"

traits.locale_text: « Vos preuves, vos arguments, vos témoins et même la Lex Imperialis ne sont que de déplorables tentatives de prendre l'ascendant sur moi. Les Étendues ne connaissent qu'une seule loi : la mienne ! Et je vous condamne tous à mort pour insubordination ! »

languages.text: “你们所有的证据、辩论、证人，甚至就连《帝国法典》本身，都不过是拙劣的阴谋罢了。你们妄图篡夺神选者的权力，但科罗努斯扩区只有一条法律，那就是我本人！我在此以谋逆的罪名，判处你们所有人死刑！”
languages.original_text: "Your evidence, arguments, witnesses, and even the Lex Imperialis are just a pathetic attempt to gain the upper hand over someone like me. There is only one law in the Expanse and I am it! And I sentence you all to death for insubordination!"

traits.locale_text: “你们所有的证据、辩论、证人，甚至就连《帝国法典》本身，都不过是拙劣的阴谋罢了。你们妄图篡夺神选者的权力，但科罗努斯扩区只有一条法律，那就是我本人！我在此以谋逆的罪名，判处你们所有人死刑！”

languages.text: «Sus pruebas, argumentos, testigos e incluso la Lex Imperialis no son más que un patético intento de colocarse en una posición superior a la mía. ¡Yo soy la única ley de la Extensión! ¡Y los condeno a todos a muerte por insubordinación!».
languages.original_text: "Your evidence, arguments, witnesses, and even the Lex Imperialis are just a pathetic attempt to gain the upper hand over someone like me. There is only one law in the Expanse and I am it! And I sentence you all to death for insubordination!"

traits.locale_text: «Sus pruebas, argumentos, testigos e incluso la Lex Imperialis no son más que un patético intento de colocarse en una posición superior a la mía. ¡Yo soy la única ley de la Extensión! ¡Y los condeno a todos a muerte por insubordinación!».

languages.text: 「君たちの証拠も議論も証人も、そしてレックス・インペリアでさえ、{mf|俺|私}のような者に勝とうとする哀れな足掻きに過ぎない。エクスパンスにあるのはただ一つの法、それは{mf|俺|私}だ！そして、反抗罪で君たち全員に死刑を言い渡す！」
languages.original_text: "Your evidence, arguments, witnesses, and even the Lex Imperialis are just a pathetic attempt to gain the upper hand over someone like me. There is only one law in the Expanse and I am it! And I sentence you all to death for insubordination!"

traits.locale_text: 「君たちの証拠も議論も証人も、そしてレックス・インペリアでさえ、{mf|俺|私}のような者に勝とうとする哀れな足掻きに過ぎない。エクスパンスにあるのはただ一つの法、それは{mf|俺|私}だ！そして、反抗罪で君たち全員に死刑を言い渡す！」

languages.text: "Delildi, argümandı, tanıktı... Hepsi, hatta Lex İmperialis bile benim gibi birine üstün gelme çabanızın ürünü. Enginlik'te tek bir kanun var, o da benim! Hepinizi itaatsizlikten ölüme mahkûm ediyorum!"
languages.original_text: "Your evidence, arguments, witnesses, and even the Lex Imperialis are just a pathetic attempt to gain the upper hand over someone like me. There is only one law in the Expanse and I am it! And I sentence you all to death for insubordination!"

traits.locale_text: "Delildi, argümandı, tanıktı... Hepsi, hatta Lex İmperialis bile benim gibi birine üstün gelme çabanızın ürünü. Enginlik'te tek bir kanun var, o da benim! Hepinizi itaatsizlikten ölüme mahkûm ediyorum!"
